Hang on. Hang on a minute.
 What do you mean by "hushing up"?

It's just a pack of lies. Everything's made up.
 If it's made up, there's nothing to worry about.

pa: Yeah, but you, of all people, should know

No.

Fuck it!

I'm not allowed to take a stand.
 Okay. But you've already done that.

Ta không được phép lên tiếng.
 Ừ, nhưng ngài lên tiếng rồi còn gì.

en: Du, Simon…

en: Vad är det?
pa: What's wrong?
vi: Sao thế?

en: Vad är det?
pa: What's wrong? What's wrong?
vi: Sao thế?

en: Vad är det?
vi: Sao thế?

en: Jag…

en: …av allt det här som händer.

en: Och…
pa: And…

I don't want to be in Bjärstad.

Everybody hates me, and those who don't hate me

Ai cũng ghét con, còn những người không ghét

en: Nej… Förlåt, älskling. Förlåt.

en: Hjärtat mitt.

en: Nej…
pa: No…

en: I dag är, som ni alla vet, en mycket viktig dag.

YOU OWN THE SCHOOL TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR YOUR HERITAGE
 Today is, as you all know, a very important day.

CÁC EM LÀ CHỦ NGÔI TRƯỜNG NÀY HÃY CHỊU TRÁCH NHIỆM VỀ DI SẢN CỦA CÁC EM
 Như các em biết, hôm nay là ngày rất hệ trọng.

en: Vi får besök från Skolinspektionen.

en: Nej, sluta, inget sånt. Inte i dag. Det här är allvar.

This is serious.
 The school's entire future depends on this investigation.

The ones who are being interviewed,
 you are to wait outside the principal's office

Nếu có em nào được hẹn phỏng vấn

en: Och rektor låter hälsa att om ni sköter er idag
pa:
at the designated times.
 And the principal will have you know

pa: that if you behave, there is a possibility that some restrictions may be lifted.

without a parent present.
 Oh, come on, honey.
 You'll do so great.

pa:
Three red ones and two green ones.
 Hey.

Hi, welcome. Hi.
 -This is, uh… - Hi.

-Nice to meet you. - So, shall we go in?
 They're coming.

en: De kommer.

Okay. And right this way.
 ♪ Breathe in, I do what I want ♪

♪ And I want… ♪
 In here, we have our library.
 ♪ Breathe in, I do what I want ♪
 ♪ And I'm gonna do ♪

pa: ♪ You ♪
♪ I don't care what you say ♪
♪ I don't ♪
♪ I won't do what you say ♪
♪ I won't ♪
♪ Hey, you, get out of my face ♪
♪ Get out ♪
♪ I had enough of ♪

♪ See ya later ♪

♪ Buh-bye ♪
 -♪ Alligator ♪
 And in here, we have our music… room.

en: Och…både kronprinsen och Simon
pa: And, uh, both… both, um… both the Crown Prince

without getting interrupted.
 We'll just have to make that happen.

Yeah, it's supposed to be a principality.

en: Öhm…

en: Kul.

then I don't get it.

-Everyone knows that. - Right.

It's 1st May.
 - Yeah, so? - Yeah?

Gì cơ?
 - Mùng Một tháng Năm mà. - Ừ, thì sao?

en: Arbetarrörelsens dag?

en: Okej, och vad är deras stil, då, eller hur firar de?

en: Man firar inte.

Okej…
pa: Okay…

But tell me, what's your plan?
 You're going out to wave your red flag around

en: -Pappa… -Mm?
pa: Dad?
vi: - Bố ơi? - Ơi.

en: -Hur var det när du gick här? -Det var nog de roligaste åren i mitt liv.

- Mm-hmm? -What was it like when you studied here?
 Well, probably the most enjoyable years of my life.

en: Men kände du dig aldrig annorlunda?

en: Jo…
pa: Well, yes.

Some different, cool clothes.
 Big, unruly hairstyles…

en: Du skulle ha sett mig.

en: Ja, fast det var ju bara att glömma här.

en: Snart såg man ut som alla andra.

en: Jag var ju den enda svarta eleven på hela skolan, så det är klart att man stack ut.

I was the only Black student when I studied here,
 so… so of course I stood out.

pa: People use the N-word as if it was perfectly normal.

en: Hm…
Ja…
pa: Hmm…

en: Men sa du aldrig nåt om det, eller pratade med en lärare?
pa: But didn't you ever speak up about it? Or talk to a teacher?

en: Men nej… Nej.
pa:
No.
 Nah.
vi:
Ừ.
 Ừ.

en: Jag fick lära mig tidigt att jag behövde vara tio gånger så bra som alla andra.

They were the same.
 I learnt early on that I…
 I had to be ten times better than everyone else.

Họ như nhau cả mà.
 Bố học được từ sớm

en: Då hade de ingenting på mig.
pa: Then they had nothing on me.

en: Det är att vinna. Spela efter spelets regler, och inte…

That's how you win.
 Play by the rules….

en: Tack.
pa: Thanks.
vi: Cảm ơn em.

en: -Felice Ehrencrona? -Ja.
pa: -Felice Ehrencrona? -Yeah.
vi: - Felice Ehrencrona? - Vâng.

en: Välkommen.
pa: Welcome.

en: -Felices pappa. -Hej.
pa: -Felice's dad. - Hi.
vi: - Bố Felice. - Chào anh.

en: Jag väntar här, då?

How nice of you to come.

Rất vui được gặp em.

en: Ditt namn kommer inte att förekomma i rapporten, så du kan vara helt ärlig.

Your name will not be mentioned in the report,
 so you can be totally honest.
vi: Em sẽ không bị nêu tên trong báo cáo nên có thể hoàn toàn thành thật.

en: Känns det okej?
pa: Is, um, that okay?
vi: Được không?

en: Mm.
pa: Mm.

en: Så, om vi tar det ifrån när du började här i höstas…

en: Hur var det för dig och de andra eleverna?
pa: How was it for you and the other students?
vi: Em và các học sinh khác thấy thế nào?

en: - Tack. - Tack.
pa:
-Thank you.
 Thank you. It's been a pleasure. Thanks.

en: Ursäkta. Vi skulle bara vilja räcka över denna.

en: Det är en namninsamling från eleverna
pa: It's a petition from the students here.

en: som har skrivit under att vi verkligen, verkligen älskar vår skola.
pa: They have signed it to show that we really, really love our school.
